section.text: *NOTE: This section was created by temporary legislation that will expire on May 4, 2023.*
section.heading: Rulemaking authority.
section.text: The Mayor, pursuant to subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2, may issue rules to implement the provisions of this chapter.
section.codify:annotation: For temporary (225 days) creation of § 7-791.03, see § 103 of High Need Healthcare Career Scholarship and Health Professional Loan Repayment Program Temporary Amendment Act of 2022 (D.C. Law 24-184, Sept. 21, 2022, 0 DCR 0).

For temporary (225 days) creation of this section, see § 103 of High Need Healthcare Career Scholarship and Health Professional Loan Repayment Program Temporary Amendment Act of 2022 (D.C. Law 24-184, Sept. 21, 2022, 0 DCR 0).
